text: @realDonaldTrump The markets reacted to your COVID-19 pandemic cover up. Why won’t you allow the epidemiologists with the CDC & the NIH, to TALK? Why are you keeping us in the dark? Keep it up. The markets will react until you stop the uncertainty and let science SPEAK. https://t.co/2fMw7Th42L

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
